C3: Computes all elementary symmetric functions in $n$ variables of degree $k$ with $1 \le k \le k_{\max}$
Computes the elementary symmetric function in $n$ variables of degree $k.$
Computes the Dedekind numbers $D_{n,q}$ for $n_{\min} \le n \le n_{\max}$ and $q_{\min} \le q \le q_{\max}$
Computes the ranks of $k$-subsets chosen from an $n$-set. $L$ is a list of $k$-sets taken from an $n$-set.
Perform the union of sets given in files.
Perform the dot product of all columns of the matrix in the given file.
Perform the dot product of all rows of the matrix in the given file.
Perform the multiplication (over Z) of the given matrix objects.
Compute a basis of the rowspan of the given matrix over R.
Create a tactical decomposition from a file in Widor format.
Computes a domino portrait for a graphics file in r/g/b format using double-$D$ domino sets.
Computes the character table of  $\Sym(n)$ using the algorithm of Burnside.
